pages.text: $(li)The Shulker Box is an improved version of the $(l:patchouli:utility/supplementaries/sack)Sack$(/l).$(br)$(li)This one does not add the slow effect when you are carrying with a few of them.
$(li)To access to its inventory, just place the Shulker Box and open it right clicking on it.

$(li)Then you can break it with to drop the item and save it in your inventory.$(br)$(li)$(l:patchouli:enchanting/shulker_enchantments/siphon)Siphon$(/l) and $(l:patchouli:enchanting/shulker_enchantments/refill)Refill$(/l) enchantments can be applied to the Shulker Boxes.$(br)$(li)You will need to place one of these enchanted books and the Shulker Box in an $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/anvil)Anvil$(/l).$(br)$(li)Shulkerboxes can be tinted with Dyes in a $(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/crafting_table)$(l:patchouli:utility/vanilla/crafting_table)Crafting Table$(/l)$(/l).
